Class TileSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.map.TileSet

  • public final class TileSet
extends java.lang.Object
    The comprehensive set of Tile that may be used in a Map. Infrastructure.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int id)
        Returns the Tile with the given id.

        This will never be null.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the tile to lookup.
        Returns:
        the tile with the given id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the specified id is invalid.
